评论概述: Wanted to like it, but odd neckline ruins it for me
评论详情: I bought this originally for NYE. The pattern is pretty with velvet on the outside , but the interior mesh is a pretty scratchy/rough material. Completely sheer aside from the velvet. The neckline is also just odd, it doesn’t sit like a normal mock-neck does, but it kind of flops and folds over not in a very flattering way. It also doesn’t have a lot of stretch to it so getting it on and off isn’t a quick feat. Wanted to like it but will be returning

评论概述: Beautiful Miduo Womens Velvet Burnout Top - But Sizing Runs Small!
评论详情: I'm delighted to share my review of the miduo Womens Slim Fit Velvet Burnout Top. I ordered this top for my wife, and she absolutely adores it! However, we did encounter some sizing issues.  My wife's usual size is Small (S), but I ordered a Medium (M) to ensure a comfortable fit. Unfortunately, the Medium still felt like a snug fit rather than a comfortable one. So, if you're looking for a relaxed fit, I'd definitely recommend sizing up.  The top itself is stunning! The velvety material is beautiful, and the burnout design adds a lovely touch of elegance. However, please note that it's quite sheer, so you'll definitely need to wear a tank top or camisole underneath.  The price of this top is reasonable, especially considering the quality of the material and the overall design.  One minor complaint is that the fitting at the neck is a bit off. It's not a deal-breaker, but it's something to be aware of.  Key Features:  - miduo Womens Slim Fit Velvet Burnout Top - Cowl neck long sleeve design - See-through sheer material - Velvety soft and elegant - Reasonable price  Pros:  - Beautiful velvety material - Elegant burnout design - Reasonable price - Lovely cowl neck long sleeve design  Cons:  - Sizing runs small, so size up for a comfortable fit - Fitting at the neck is a bit off - Quite sheer, so wear a tank top or camisole underneath  Overall, I'd recommend this top to anyone looking for a beautiful, velvety burnout top. Just be sure to size up for a comfortable fit!

评论概述: Elegant Sheer Shirts with Gorgeous Sheen but Minor Flaws
评论详情: These shirts are absolutely gorgeous! I purchased both the light blue and dark blue, which work well for different occasions. The fabric has a stunning sheen that I adore, and the material is thin and sheer, as advertised (I included a photo to show how see-through it is).  The fit, however, is a bit awkward. There’s no distinct front or back, and it seems designed for a flatter body type, which leaves little room for a fuller chest. This causes some fabric bunching above my chest, but the sheen and neckline almost make it look like an intentional ruffle detail.  The material is velvety, soft, and has a slight stretch, but I wouldn’t describe it as stretchy. Unfortunately, the velvet sheds, and by the end of the day, I noticed small fluff balls of fabric on my other clothes.  Despite these issues, I still love the shirts for their unique style and sheen. I think they’re reasonably priced for the quality, but I do wish the fabric wouldn’t shed. Overall, they’re pretty and versatile pieces I’ll continue to wear!

评论概述: Flattering top but it does run small
评论详情: This top is gorgeous with high quality velvet but I do recommend sizing up 1-2 sizes. Item does stretch as I normally wear a medium in tops but ordered a large. Item fits but is tighter than I prefer, especially around the neck and the shoulders. Do not machine dry.
Comfortable and pretty color combo. It fit but I would size up one if you have bigger size bust. I typically wear a large and my chest is a 36DD. I sized up to an XL & it fit.

评论概述: SO CLOSE, BUT SO FAR! Gorgeous color, but serious issues with sizing, etc.. Please read review!
评论详情: MAANNNNNN I wanted this top to work so much! The color is stunning and if you are able to figure out the sizing, would be a flattering form fit. Overall, I would NOT recommend for the reasons herein, but I gave a generous 3 stars because it MAY WORK FOR YOU and if it does, $20 is totally reasonable.  The main issue is with sizing (if you've read the other reviews, this isn't new news). I am normally a 2-4 so I ordered a small (34/36 b/c bust, 5'1" petite and fit). Even being fit and preferring form-fitting tops, this was uncomfortably tight. If I were to order again, I would order up TWO sizes to a large because of the characteristics of the material.  Another issue is it is WAY too thin - so thin it feels like a cheap piece made for cheap labor in China :( Certain material on my skin really bothers me, and I could tell this was more polyester than the listing lead me to believe. Doesn't matter the cost, I can't wear clothing which feels overwhelming polyester. One reviewer stated a camisole is need under this, and if so, there's simply no room for it and you will burn up.  Even if I could get the right size and the material didn't bother me, I wouldn't be able to get over the collar. It's floppy with too little/too much loose material. Honestly, I felt like a Thanksgiving turkey! haha!  I gave this a generous 3 stars because if you are able to get the sizing correct and the neck/material doesn't bother you, $20 is an excellent price for a pretty piece. If you are someone who views clothing as investment, though, I do not recommend as this $20 will not get you a quality piece which will last.
Love this top. I rarely wear blue but this top looks really nice. True to size in my opinion
Ordered in black. Beautiful shirt but size way up. My normal size is medium but had to order XXL.

评论概述: Very pretty fabric and pattern, fits to size.
评论详情: I love the long sleeved fitted tops, they can be worn on their own or under jackets and vests. Long tight sleeves always look very elegant. The miduo top fabric is so pretty, it has the 3D pattern, which is subtle, and combined with the velvety texture and burgundy color, it looks very dressy. I wear M (6-8, 34dd, very long arms), and I like the fit. It is not cropped and not too long, looks good tucked in or out. The turtleneck is a bit too loose for my taste. I wore it for a couple of hours, and did not in it, but it requires more vigorous testing to be sure, considering the fabric contents.  Recommend.

I typically wear a small but this fit my arms and across my bust (which is small). Material is pretty and I didn't find it see through when on as some have mentioned. Unfortunately there's a weird gap across the upper chest/collarbone area, so I returned it.
Shirt was very tight. It smelled horribly when I received it. Ended up returning, just not for me.

Although I would recommending sizing up to have room for a tank, because it was fairly tight. The neck portion seemed awkward, too warm and I just didn’t like how it fit on me.

This runs slightly smaller than i'd like, but it fit. The fabric is sheer, you'll probably need a cami underneath. (Don't do this unless you know what you're doing but I cut the collar off and successfully turned it into a boat neck top, it's the neck that's the tightest.)

This shirt is so gorgeous!! I read the reviews and saw a lot of complaints about fit being too small. The largest size in Red was XL so I bought it with hopes it would fit. It is TINY! Definitely foreign sizing unfortunately which you know is much smaller than US sizes. But I immediately looked online and there was an XXL available today. I immediately bought it!! Its such a beautiful shirt! I can't wait to wear it.  Its definitely 5 star! I can't give less stars just because the item didn't fit me. That is the gamble with ordering online.

This is a very nice, dressy top, provided there's a camisole underneath. I love the pattern and the blue velvet, though not the sheerness. I'll be wearing it over the holidays. I recommend washing it inside-out, and leaving it to air dry.
The material is okay, and the shirt looks cute. But it is def on the small side, i would even suggest sizing up two sizes!
I like this slim velvet top. It's actually really cute and the material feels nice. It is slim fitting, so just be aware.
Really cute top.  It runs a bit small but it still works.  The fabric sheds quite a bit so I recommend washing it separately because it will get all over everything else you wash.

I got a medium which is the size I normally wear. I have to return it because it is really tight in the shoulders and chest. I’m a B cup so I’m not particularly large on that front. The pattern and material is nice if a bit thin. I would recommend sizing up.

This velvet burnout mesh top is absolutely stunning! The fabric is beautiful, and the semi-sheer effect is subtly sexy. However, be warned: it runs incredibly small. I ordered my usual size, and while I could technically get it on, it was skin-tight to the point of discomfort.  The turtleneck was particularly challenging to get over my head, and the overall fit was just too restrictive for my liking. I would definitely recommend sizing up, maybe even two sizes, for a more comfortable fit.  On the plus side, the sheerness is surprisingly subtle. You can comfortably wear a regular bra underneath without it being overly visible.  Pros:  Beautiful velvet burnout fabric Semi-sheer with decent coverage Stylish and unique design  Cons:  Extremely tight fit: Size up! Turtleneck is difficult to get on  If you're willing to navigate the sizing challenges, this top is a real showstopper. Just be sure to order a larger size than you normally would!
